features.title: TurboWarp Button
features.description: Adds a button to the editor that will open the project in the TurboWarp Editor when clicked.

features.title: Advanced Search
features.description: Replaces the basic search that Scratch uses with a much better and smarter search.

features.title: Color Slider
features.description: Replaces the number input for the outline width in the paint editor with a slider.

features.title: More Tutorials
features.description: Adds extra tutorials to the ideas page.

features.title: NFE Search
features.description: Use a button to search all projects, including NFE ones.

features.title: Statistics
features.description: Adds a statistics button on the my stuff page that leads to the user's ScratchStats profile.

features.title: Open in New Tab
features.description: Automatically opens links on project pages in a new tab.

features.title: Plain Background
features.description: Removes the dots from the background of the code editor.

features.title: Unbold Site Text
features.description: Makes it so that all test across Scratch is unbolded, and just normal text!

features.title: Compact Navbar
features.description: Makes more room on the navigation bar near where your profile dropdown is.

features.title: Round Profile Pictures
features.description: All profile pictures on the Scratch website will be rounded.

features.title: Start Project on Load
features.description: Automatically starts the project on project pages after it has loaded.

features.title: Sidebar
features.description: Adds a sidebar to the Scratch website, rather than just the normal navigation bar at the top of the screen.

features.title: Recently Viewed Ptojects
features.description: Adds a tab to the My Stuff page where you can see a list of the projects that you have recently viewed.
